Name: The Sunny Life
About the game: Start a new life! Will you run the best shop in the town? Why don't you check out what does the neighbourhood has to offer? The choice is yours! Take your time and enjoy yourself in Atirin. Open your own shop! Do you want to open a bakery? How about a greengrocer's shop? Or maybe you've always wanted to sell your own creation? The choice is yours! Level up your shop through all the phases of popularity. From an unknown local shop to a regional star! Marine décor will make it easier to sell fish, country décor will help you sell fruits and vegetables, and fancy décor should be your choice when selling sculptures and paintings!. Meet new friends! The city bustles with life. It is worth getting to know its characters and their stories. And who knows, maybe you will get to be really close to someone. Four seasons and dynamic weather Each season is different, and each has different holidays. The summer festival is a great opportunity to stock up on ice cream and special summer accessories. I bet all my strawberries that you can win an apple-eating competition during the first day of autumn festival. Winter is the time for fishing tournaments and gift-giving to loved ones. And the end of spring is the festival of the first harvest!
